Detailed Description

A line shape.

A line shape consisting of one or more line segments that delivers points uniformly distributed along the line segments. This shape is defined via 

:start shape:
    library = egs_line_shape
    points = list of 2D positions, at least 2 required.
:stop shape:

Note that the line is assumed to be in the xy-plane at z=0. For other lines, attach an affine transformation to the line shape.
